column2: Determines the Lenght of how long an elected leader can stay in office.
Establish an Dictatorship to get rid of the election cycles for future leaders
Rule at leisure of The Witch King, Easily replaced should you displease him.
Guilds of Marienburg and westerland as whole are contantly vying for power and theres very little the nobility can do to curtail them with the ingrained power base of the merchants.
Guilds of Westerland have acquired power to control much of westerland and will strive to diminish the hold on the land by the nobility.
Guilds have been severly weakened and are unable to make any demands of Lords of westerland, but they are sure to raise again

Greenskins don't have the same concept of ruler as the other races, instead the strong rule over the weak. That is the only Greenskin law.\n Each level of this law will be automatically passed to its next level at 500, 1000, 4000 and 8000 piety for each respective level.\n The average time for the next level of the law to be enacted is 1 year, but it can be shortened with certain traits.
The Greenskins of this tribe don't respect your authority at all. Next level available at 500.
The Greenskins now grudgingly respect your authority. Next level available at 1000.
The Greenskins now somewhat respect your authority. Next level available at 4000.
The Greenskins now respect your authority. Next level available at 8000.
The Greenskins now completely respect your authority.
He is of a different race.

The ruler, the marshal and the generals can nominate a successor from among themselves and relatives of the ruler. Advisors are valid electors in Kingdoms and Empires. Military command is very popular among martial societies.
To define the attitude towards other Greenskin races within your personal horde.
Surely the best of the best of lesser Greenskins can be used?
[Root.Holder.Culture.GetName]s are da best and the only ones deserving to be part of da Horde!
Controls the tolerance of different religions within the realm.
Favour the gods of the Old World and their customs. The Chaos gods won't be too happy...
Anyone may worship whatever god they wish within your realm. Your populace will be happy, but your vassals will not care...
Favour the Chaos Gods and their customs, like a true Norscan should.
Controls the tolerance of Old World religions within the realm and affects the functionalities of the Cult of the Lady and her Damsels and Fay Enchantress.
The peasantry are allowed to choose their own religion

There has never been precedent to try and persuade the filthy peasants of religious matters, as it is not an important factor for the Lady. The peasantry have been therefore left to their own devices, as long as they don't stray into the hands of Chaos.
Allows control of further conversion away from the Grail in events
The Nobility has some differentiating opinions with the Fay Enchantress about the direction of worship within the realm, resulting in clashes with the damsels and different Old World religious cults.
The ignorance of the peasantry is no long permissable, and Bretonnia has finally unleashed the inquisition upon the unsuspecting innocent populace. May the gods have mercy on them!
Allows access to religious conversions within the Old World religion group
Only you are allowed to carve out new tenures by sub-letting part of your lands to tenants.
Allow some vassals to carve out new tenures by sub-letting part of their lands to tenants.
Allow all vassals to carve out new tenures by sub-letting part of their lands to tenants.
Carve out new and distinct tenures by sub-letting land to tenants.\n\nTrades demesne size for more vassals and increased vassal opinion. Also controls Viceroyalty laws.

The ruler and each Bretonnian Duke can nominate a successor from all the Grail Knights. Elective Succession is very popular with the vassals, but they will not approve if their liege personally holds too many elector titles.
Dwarfs take their ancestry as seriously as they take their grudges. Each Dwarf belongs to a Clan — a group of Dwarfs who can trace their descent to a common point.
Favor the Warrior clan, providing you with more troops.
Favor the landholding Elite, boosting their opinion of you but reducing troop reinforcement rate.
Favor the Rangers, boosting their opinion of you.
Favor the Slayers, boosting their opinion of you.
The skaven clans structure themselves how ever they wish at all times to represent the needs of their clan leader.
This clan Partakes in scavenging the dead in any battle field they can find on the surface and the underground to strenghten their coffers.
This clan Prides themselves in their elite warriors first and foremost.
This clan is filled with cowardly skaven to the brim to maximize their numbers.
